CustomField.inlineHelpText:
This section should be used to outline the review of and subsequent recommendations for clients' existing pensions.
DC pensions should include: plan status e.g. active/paid up, penalties or guarantees, ongoing contributions, TFC, retirement options including nominee drawdown, total charges vs NOVA, can adviser charging be added, EOW, investment options, current equity content e.g. c90%, other factors.
CustomField.label: Pension Review Advice
